pkgmetadata.longdescription: ### pytest-embedded-idfpytest embedded service for esp-idf projectExtra Functionalities:=== "`pytest-embedded-serial-esp` activated" - `app`: parse the built binary by idf rules and gather more information. - `serial`: auto flash the built binary into the target board at the beginning when running test cases.=== "`pytest-embedded-serial-esp` NOT activated" - `app`: parse the built binary by idf rules and gather more information.Used CLI Options:- `part-tool`
